alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 6:59PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Lawrence, southeastern Lawrence, Cabell, west central Kanawha, Putnam, Lincoln, Wayne and northwestern Boone Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 659 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Dunlow, or 10 miles east of Louisa, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Charleston, Huntington, Nitro, Winfield, Wayne, Hamlin, Chesapeake, Proctorville, Beech Fork State Park, Jefferson, South Charleston, St. Albans, Dunbar, Hurricane, Barboursville, Milton, Eleanor, Poca, Ranger and Harts. This includes the following highways... Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 8 and 54. Route 119 between mile markers 54 and 77. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
